{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.06590v1", "title": "Obstruction Theory for Bigraded Differential Algebras", "summary": "We develop an obstruction theory for Hirsch extensions of cbba's with twisted
coefficients. This leads to a variety of applications, including a structural
theorem for minimal cbba's, a construction of relative minimal models with
twisted coefficients, as well as a proof of uniqueness. These results are
further employed to study automorphism groups of minimal cbba's and to
characterize formality in terms of grading automorphisms.", "main_category": "math.AT", "categories": "math.AT,math.AC,math.DG", "published": "2025-04-09T05:35:50Z"}
